content:
the government we are going to create is going to fail because the colonists created a government that was like night and day from the British government

the government created was too weak and had no power at all

this gov didn’t have no executive branch since the colonists’ interaction with the king and royal governors was a very unpleasant experience
	-not having this branch also makes the federal government not have any power in enforcing laws

also they are not going to have a judicial branch
